## Lectura de datos

```{r lectura, include=FALSE}
datos_train <- read.table("./datos/drugLibTrain_raw.tsv", sep="\t", comment.char="", 
quote = "\"", header=TRUE)
datos_test <- read.table("./datos/drugLibTest_raw.tsv", sep="\t", comment.char="", 
quote = "\"", header=TRUE)
View(datos_train)
View(datos_test)
```
